verbs.description: < p > [ARG1: Tax experts for global corporations] [V: are] [ARG2: hot] [ARGM-LOC: on the trail of loopholes in the sweeping tax law approved in December by President Donald Trump and Republicans in the U.S. Congress.</p >]

< p > Tax experts for global corporations are hot on the trail of loopholes in [ARG1: the sweeping tax law] [V: approved] [ARGM-TMP: in December] [ARG0: by President Donald Trump and Republicans in the U.S.] Congress.</p >
